Class playn.core.gl.GLContext

Added Methods
int getScissorDepth() Returns the current scissor stack size.
Rectangle popScissorState() Removes the most recently pushed scissor state and returns the rectangle that should now be used for clipping, or null if clipping should be disabled.
Rectangle pushScissorState(int, int, int, int) Adds the given rectangle to the scissors stack, intersecting with the previous one if it exists.
String quadShaderInfo() Returns debugging info on the quad shader.
Stats stats() Returns the current rendering stats.
String trisShaderInfo() Returns debugging info on the triangles shader.
